title: [GOOD OMENS animatic.] Crowley's trial (ish)
author: Fel-Fisk
comment:
Demons: Shame, Shame, Shame!
Aziraphale: Crowley we're late for dinner.
I'm tickled by the idea of Aziraphale being Hell's Stu. Crowley's banished, but the other demons think the angel's cool and he can hang out.
A crossover I didn't knew I needed but thank you very much I'll have 50 more of those

0:57
He’s deadass scared but all it is is
“Shame”
“SHamE”
You're gonna get copyright strike for uploading all of Crowley's trial
description:
This is 110% definitely how crowley’s trial went down, 110%. 


Another Good Omens / What We Do In The Shadow’s crossover bc the possibilities that combination presents are Too Good to pass up & I have zero (0) restraint. Nick’s trial just works really well for Crowley fjellas, I don’t make the rules.

Also, this is probably like, the cleanest & biggest animatic I’ve done to date?? (it’s still Messy, but like,,, has backgrounds, semi clean lineart, colour and Many Characters;; which is Beyond what my other ones have been) and I’m actually really chuffed I managed to get it done before my last term @ uni started up :v !! I only,, just managed to scrape that (via an all nighter the day of my first classes, oof.) but!! Still!  Im v happy with how this lad turned out c:

--

“” Animated”” entirely in photoshop over like, a week?? Ish? over many late nights

 Audio from/ animatic based on Nick’s Trial from WWDITS
